Posts.EditableText: Hello i'm a gamer since im young I am now 29 and I always liked roguelikes and text adventure games aswell as muds, Space sims etc I'm a huge nerd when it comes to gaming so i'm wondering if anybody would like to discuss about the game im working on and maybe try it or I can stream some gameplay, people I know don't understand the beauty of text adventures like i do ;o
